name: go-ast-codelens
description: Displays AST node counts for Go functions via CodeLens, helping you identify functions suitable for inline optimization.

commands.title: Go AST CodeLens: Delete AST Counter Binary
Go AST CodeLens: Rebuild AST Counter Binary

goAstCodeLens.debounceDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before recalculating AST nodes after typing stops

goAstCodeLens.showOnlyInlineable.description: Only show CodeLens for functions with less than 80 AST nodes (inlineable)

goAstCodeLens.maxFuncCalls.description: Maximum number of function calls allowed to show CodeLens (0 = no function calls allowed)

goAstCodeLens.showNoinline.description: Show CodeLens for functions with //go:noinline directive

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
